name: Meam: Personal Journal
description: Meam is more than a diary app. It's your virtual friend that will help you become happier and more productive.

name: Device Info Toolkit
description: With Device Info you can find information about storage, battery, network and wifi, sensors, CPU, operating system and much more.

name: Mildd: Sounds to Sleep
description: Mildd is an app made for you to connect with nature, providing relaxation, reducing stress and anxiety and helping to combat insomnia.

name: ShopEasy: List & Savings
description: ShopEasy is a powerful tool that helps you find the best deals and manage your grocery budget effectively.

name: LS Maps
description: LS Maps is a tool designed to facilitate efficient management and assignment of maps for preaching in Sign Language congregations.

name: QuickHub: Task Manager
description: QuickHub simplifies agile project management with seamless GitHub integration. An intuitive, minimalist solution for fast and efficient task execution.
